refentryinfo.title: Actual date Folder = create timestamp dir with optional name linux/windows

refnamediv.refpurpose: Actual date Folder = create timestamp dir with optional name linux/windows

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Actual date Folder = create timestamp dir with optional name linux/windows
af .................... without commandline line parameter it creates just ./2000_05_25
af <my_folder> .. with string parameter it creates ./2000_05_25_my_folder

refsect1.title: FOLDER_NAME
refsect1.para: Name string used as suffix for directory name.
